title: What's New Page
description: A dedicated page showing all the latest features and improvements. See what's new at a glance with screenshots and step-by-step guides.
benefit: Stay informed about new capabilities without digging through updates. Each entry shows you exactly what changed and how to use it.
howToUse: Each entry includes screenshots showing the feature
Follow the 'How to Use' steps to get started
Check back regularly for new features

screenshots.alt: Changelog page showing feature updates with screenshots
screenshots.caption: Visual documentation of every new feature
